--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> OOC: No, I plan him to go with whomever gets there first.
> 
> Bic:
> 
> Detecting nothing, the khan decided to move closer. As he closed 
in, 
> he examined the pod.
> 
> Vlad: What is that thing? It is not a projectile of any sort... It 
> lacks any propulsors or warhead. It seems more like... an escape 
> shuttle.
> 
> He sees a computer pad and many electronic devices that he does not 
> recognize. He realized that whatever this was, it was not of clan 
> technology, much less human...
> 
> He transformed to his more man-like form and tried to figure out 
what 
> to do. It was fairly simple as there was a flashing button that he 
> decided to press...
